diagnosis: Can you tell me what diagnoses the doctor gave the patient? Format- diagnosis: [list of diagnoses]
medications: List all the medications doctor prescribed for the patient.
For each medication, give detail instructions including the dosage, frequency, duration, indication if mentioned.
lifestyle_adjustments: Identify any specific changes the doctor suggested the patient make to their daily routine or habits.
Give details of the follow_up appointment discussed with the doctor.
followUp: Give detailed information about of the follow-up appointment discussed with the doctor.
